captures.author: Ian Lapham
captures.text: trend I'm noticing: People think they're being productive using fancy agent setups and AI tools. But in reality it's mostly dopamine loop chasing and procrastination...
captures.whyInteresting: Sharp contrarian take on agent productivity as variable-reward procrastination

captures.author: Delba
captures.text: 10x productivity tip: use Claude hooks with sounds so Claude alerts you when it finishes a task or needs permission. Add Starcraft/Mario sounds.

captures.author: Clark Wimberly
captures.text: That AI.com commercial? With the $5m Super Bowl slot and the $70m domain name? It's an OpenClaw wrapper.
captures.whyInteresting: Super Bowl AI ad is just an OpenClaw wrapper

captures.author: hesam
captures.text: okay so what's the real use case of OpenClaw? Made a repo for real use cases and workflows.
captures.whyInteresting: Community repo for OpenClaw use cases

captures.author: Rob Hallam
captures.text: Anthropic just dropped a 33-page guide on how to build skills in Claude

captures.author: Angry Tom
captures.whyInteresting: Seedance 2.0 hype — relevant to Red Rising video project

captures.author: du
captures.text: Holy grail scenario: Solo operator using AI for time savings, reinvesting into unscalable personal touch

captures.author: Moon Dev
captures.text: billion dollar use case of clawdbot — replicates strategy that took $20K to $40M
captures.whyInteresting: Bold claim about Claude automation for trading/business

captures.author: shafu
captures.text: Thoughts on Agentic Commerce: x402 replaces api keys, stablecoins are agent money, usage based pricing kills subscriptions

captures.author: Dan Shipper
captures.text: BREAKING: Bad Bunny at halftime says Opus pa vibear, Codex pa lo heavy

captures.author: Andrew Solender
captures.text: my takeaway from the super bowl ads is that the entire american economy is being propped up by AI, weight loss drugs, cryptocurrency and gambling

captures.author: param
captures.text: They are releasing models you are too poor to use
captures.whyInteresting: Commentary on premium AI model pricing gap

captures.author: Frank
captures.text: My favorite thing in the world to play with now. You can accurately research anything on X now.

captures.text: OpenClaw templates article — 1100 bookmarks in 6 hours
